name: Rorrim (V.0.1)
description:
Rorrim is a little wave based game I made in a week.

This is the first game under the Press Delete name.

Keep in mind this is a early version, much is yet to change.

I will always respond to feedback and apply it to the game and future games.

I will update this game often.

You control two players with the same input, PlayerRor and PlayerRim (orange guy and blue guy) . Your goal is to shoot the bats, but only PlayerRor (orange guy) can kill RorBats (red bats) and only PlayerRim (blue guy) can kill RimBats (green bats)

-ROAD MAP-

-more maps

-more enemy types

-highscore system

-more power up types

-stage hazards 

-settings menu

-mac version

I hope you have even a little bit of fun playing this game, because thats the reason I make games, to make people's day even the slightest bit better in the only way I know how.

Thank you, and have a QUAFFTASTIC day. 

-Credits-

all credit goes to the Press Delete team, I am the only member of that team right now, so all credit goes to me! 

Programming : Quaffy 

Art : Quaffy

Everything : Quaffy

Special thanks to YOU for looking at this page and considering to play this game.

(Rorrim backwards is Mirror..)
